title: Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride -Faux Leather, Gold Foil 'Future Mrs' Wedding Binder I Includes Pen, Bookmark & Stickers I Engagement Gifts for Women I Wedding Planning Book Checklist
descriptions:
Product Name: Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride

Product Details:

This beautiful Wedding Planner Book and Organizer is the perfect tool for any bride-to-be preparing for her special day. Crafted with a Faux Leather cover and adorned with a stylish Gold Foil "Future Mrs" design, this planner is not only functional but also a lovely keepsake.

The planner comes with a set of useful items including a Gold Pen for jotting down important notes, a Bookmark with the heartwarming quote "One step closer to marrying my soulmate," and 3 Stickers to add a personal touch to your planning.

The interior of the planner features a Green Leaf design, providing a serene and calming aesthetic while you plan your big day. The planner is secured with a Magnetic Strap, ensuring your pages stay in place and your planning remains organized.

This planner is specifically designed for US weddings, with a 18-month undated calendar and a 12-month checklist to keep your planning on track. It also includes a Budget Tracker, Guest Lists, Seating Planner, Vows, and Vendor Contact Logs, making it a comprehensive tool for all your wedding planning needs.

The Golden open/close binder not only adds a touch of elegance but also allows for easy customization. You can add, remove, or rearrange pages to suit your specific needs, making this planner truly your own.

This Wedding Planner Book and Organizer is an ideal engagement gift for women, offering high quality and sentimental value. It is manufactured by a Small US Business, ensuring you are supporting local craftsmanship.

If you have any concerns or need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
